about_the_game:
attention--　●Regarding controller input --attention
「Ships Contracted」are based on Xinput compatible controller operation.
1　Basic operations in the game can be performed with the Xinput controller.
2　You can also use the mouse and keyboard for auxiliary actions.
3　You can not play the game with just a mouse and keyboard.


Operate a floating ship that can fly freely in the sky and travel to various places.
We will proceed with the event at the place we visited by using the action of the floating ship.
By advancing the event, the places where you can travel will increase, and the story will be advanced.

The biggest feature is that there are no enemies, bosses, monsters, etc. to defeat.
Why don't you travel the world freely in a world without enemies and forget about the real world for a while?

● Story
The captain of the contracted floating ship, the main character "Oblivion Cass" is a millionaire with huge wealth. But I can't remember what it was before I got the floating ship. Without being able to remember anything, I get involved in an event that seems to lead to my past, triggered by a rumor in a pub that stood up.


●Game Concept
Tired of dark and sad stories?
In the 「ship contracted」, the player can have bright and hopeful
It was created with the aim of creating a worldview and story.

● System
1. Character operation and floating ship operation by "getting on and off"
　You can switch.
2. By mastering the actions of the character and the floating ship
　Advance the event and advance the story.
　What kind of ending awaits at the end of the story?
3, branch end.
　Depending on how you proceed, certain events may have different endings.
　It's not a perfect multi-ending, but please enjoy the various endings.


● What you can do with a floating ship
　　Getting on and off
　　Movement by turning up, down, left, right, front and back
　　Bombardment (rainbow shot)
　　Attitude control
　　Boost acceleration
　　Barrier
　　Map display
　　Gear switching
　　Change the viewpoint angle
　　Change the viewpoint distance (keyboard operation)
　　Power-ups ・ The ability of floating ships can be strengthened with power-up items scattered around the country.

● What you can do with the player (character)
　　Getting on and off
　　Summon a floating ship
　　dash
　　Jump
　　Combo jump
　　Telescope mode
　　Return from high places
　　Camera operation with a high degree of freedom
　　Change the camera distance as well as the angle
　　Fixed camera position ・ It is possible to operate the viewpoint as unlimited as possible with a radio-controlled camera.

● Fun Hidden function released under specific conditions
１、Convenient function with keyboard
２、Photo mode
３、？？？？？
４、？？？？？？？？？？
５、？？？？？？？？
Please buy and play 3-5 and find out for yourself.


● How to enjoy the elements
1. After clearing it once, you can replay it with the achievement function
　Let's complete (not the achievement function of steam).
　Please find the part that changes by achieving achievements.
2. In addition to progressing the story, explore beautiful places,
　Would you like to enjoy images with a different atmosphere from a fixed camera?
3. How about a leisurely sightseeing flight from the cockpit perspective?
　You can move the camera freely as much as possible on the contract floating ship.　
　Find your favorite angle and enjoy flying on the floating ship.


● New challenge
　　Equipped with a dedicated mode for creating live video distribution via YouTube, etc.
　　If you follow the terms, you can deliver live without confirmation of prior permission.
　　However, the distribution prohibited area cannot be used in the video. (Video / audio)
　　Uploading is prohibited in both prohibited areas.
　　Spoilers are also prohibited.

Before actually delivering, such as more detailed rules
Please be sure to read the "Video streaming" page on the Ship Contracted official website.
1　Click "Visit website" on the Steam store page link
2　Click the link to the "Video streaming" page

content_descriptors.notes:
Expressions of violence and gore
"There is a drawing that reproduces fake blood, where a person dies."

nudity or sexual content
"On the one hand, we used a free camera angle, but on the other hand, we were able to capture the character's underwear."
"There are no expressions such as sexual intercourse between men and women."
Also, in photography mode, the character may be penetrated, and the camera may show the inside of the clothing. (Only product version can start photo mode)

name: 契約の浮遊船　失った記憶と空の遺跡

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy 契約の浮遊船　失った記憶と空の遺跡

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 580X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: I did not conduct an actual machine survey, but describe the requirements for estimated values. If you are worried about the computer system requirements , please check if the trial version can maintain 30-40FPS or more before purchasing.SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5-9300H or Ryzen 5 3550H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 6800S
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: I did not conduct an actual machine survey, but describe the requirements for estimated values. If you are worried about the computer system requirements , please check if the trial version can maintain 30-40FPS or more before purchasing.SSD recommended

short_description: When you have a bad experience at work or school, how about getting on a floating ship and flying freely in the sky and forgetting the real world? Relax in a world where there are no enemies or monsters to defeat, and follow the clues that lead to the hero's past.
